column1: review_description

I'm only able to play 3 songs then it stops streaming all songs. When I press the play button nothing happens. To fix, I have to restart the phone, logg out then in, or reinstall the apps. When either of those things are done, it still only plays 3 songs then stops playing again. This needs to be fixed or I'll switch to another service. I have a Samsung galaxy s22 ultra.

In the past I rated Spotify 5 stars. But for weeks now I have been having issues with the app. I'm using a premium account and when I click on a song it would show it's playing but it won't play any music, it loads I can see the icon picture and lyrics but its not playing the song. If it decides to play after 2 songs it stops again for hours, i would click play but it won't play out my songs. I have updated the app still the same thing.It makes me quite sad cause I love music. I hope they fix it
App keeps on crashing no matter how many times I reinstall it. Apps that require a paid subscription and when you are unable to make use of it are really a bummer.

The UI is atrocious. Clearly no one at spotify uses this or does any tests whatsoever. Where is everything? Literally every other Music app has a better UI. My Suggestion: Make it not atrocious. It also crashes randomly.
Albums aren't loading. UI looks good. Please fix albums aren't loading
I can't open the play-pause-next button and song previewed anymore but the song still played, please fix this.

Not only do you not get to listen to any one particular song when you so wish to, it also has ads. The ads aren't a problem, because otherwise they wouldn't even offer free plans. The ads with the constant shuffle? Total garbage meant to ruin your day

This app has not worked for 2 months, can't open the app, only way to open it was long press the app then click the liked songs but then if you press the home button on the Spotify app then it crashes. For 2 months! Tried reinstall, clear data nothing works. Fix the app

Ads just ruin it. Especially the AD that says enjoy the next 30mins add free. That's literally an ad saying there's no ads. Geez who doesn't have something that blocks ads nowadays? Going back to my ad blocker site. Not snitchin. Annoying app for me I'm sorry.

This app is so bad just busy to show huge amount of ads after a nano second even i cant play a single song because of lengthy ads. its a waste of time to use this application . youtube and other apps are better than this app. Thank you. Ads is not everything spotify has to give skip button or something like that from which we can skip ads. this app making me angry because its wasting my time. im uninstalling this app and installing again soundcloud thats it.
Songs are not playing unless I close the app, open it and play the song again. I have to repeat the process for each song. Rating 1 star for you to take actions quickly, it's been a week.

I used to love this app alot and i had considered upgrading to premium.. But these days its always acting up.. You listen to two songs then it doesn't play the next.. I've tried everything from rebooting my phone to uninstalling and reinstalling but it isn't budging... To be honest its quite irritating and frustrating.. I give it 2 stars for the respect i have for the app.. Please look into the matter

Craftmanship from USSR and a comic book villain capitalist ruling over it. Everything is made hard. Shuffle button behind a pay wall but why would you pay if the music keeps stopping at random and only way to fix it would be restarting the phone? If they want to sell the shuffle button they should at least show it in free version (grayed out for example). Not let people search the internet IF there even is an option

Spotify is a great service,but the app gets buggy sometimes. Managing podcasts can be a chore also, but overall it's pretty good. Miserable experience in the last week. Can't play a new songs for more than minutes, it freezes for no reason. Please fix this it's ruining the whole experience

songs often get stuck at 0:00 basically it didn't even play. i tried uninstalling and reinstalling it a quiet few times but it still happens. pls i beg you to fix this immediately, this app is my coping mechanism.

Free version is the worst. Try making a playlist and only listening to those songs. It's impossible. I don't want recommended music, I don't want similar music I only want to hear the music I selected to make a playlist. Give me All the ads you want but don't add music I didn't ask for and then penalize me for skipping them. This is the equivalent to bullying a person to pay for a service and I won't stand for it. If you choose to use the app don't do the free version cause you'll hate it

I'm sick and tired of having unwanted suggested songs autoplay and shuffle in whenever I try to play a playlist, and being unable to skip them if I've used up the amount of skips given per hour. I can't even get rid of them from my queue without skipping even if I try to click off onto other playlists or close the app. Hiding the song does nothing to help either. PLEASE give us an option to remove suggested songs from our queue/let us edit what songs are coming up by having a music queue button!

The free version feels completely pointless, in it doesn't perform the most basic requirement of a music player - letting you pick songs you want to listen to, and listen to them. You can only give it a loose suggestion of what to play for you. And then you still get ads. I can't speak to the premium version, but the demo experience has done nothing to make me consider trying it. Just use youtube instead

This is quite possibly the worst app I've ever installed (uninstalled now). You can't listen to what you want, only what they force you to listen to. Search is useless. UI makes very little sense. Never using this awful rubbish ever again! Would give 0 stars if could

Stops playing music/podcasts after 30 or so mins. There's no 'now playing' bar at the bottom anymore so you can't skip songs/skip/rewind on podcasts. Earbud button functionality has gone. Spotify need to sort this out in the next week or so or I'm going to cancel my sub

Latest update causes music player bar to sporadically disappear throughout the day (both in-app and out). Can't start music sometimes as well. Not to mention the UX changes made over the past couple of years making navigating my own saved music a hassle.

Spotify has been playing very well for me. However, I am dealing with an annoying bug in which the music only plays for close to 10 seconds before quitting. I would clear my cache, re-install, and even made sure to fix my battery optimization. It would play, but then it would cut the song off at odd times. I can't really subscribe to a service that isn't working like it should. I don't know what happened, but this isn't the Spotify I remembered using.

Horrible fake promotions , I opt for the premium plan which was availble for 120 /- after availing Student discount but after making the payment, debit amount was 450 /- and I didn't recieved any info why they have charged 3 times of original price. Also even after upgrading to premium, app still has some bugs, earlier download button was not working but after sometime it was working. I don't know why they have charged 450/- even after receiving receipt via mail showing Amt 120/-

I wish I could give 0 stars. I love Spotify so much but have been having major issues for years. I almost never update because every time I do something goes wrong which makes it unusable. Realized I hadn't updated since 2020, so I updated and it took me off of my premium family plan even though NO info changed, I can't see my playlists OR the play button/bar, and I have to close the app to get the audio to stop. Please fix this MESS of an App for real, this is ridiculous.

In the start it was quite good, last month ive been trying to fix it but cant, i only see the artist and the song title but when i click it its on a duration, please spotify fix this. Ive been uninstalling installing but stil not fixed.

This app has gone downhill, cuts out half way thru a song, the play button dissappears, takes a long time to load my playlists, even with wifi at its full, they better do something or else people will move to another platform,

It plays music, but the ads are insane, you can only listen to playlists on shuffle, and the button to repeat a song is gone, so you can only play a song once. You can't listen to a song by itself, just the preview. I miss the old Spotify.

Everything is good except audio quality, Songs selection, recommendation, UI, I love it but in terms of audio quality even when i suscribe - its way too low then others. They dont even allow to talk tk customer care services.
Super slow to open. Have made UI worse. Downloads hidden from view for no good reason.
Buggy with a terrible ui.

Same song over and over and your app just cuts off whenever it wants. I mean same song I've had to literally hit the hide button on songs I like just to stop hearing them. We are so intelligent yet none of our technology works correctly and we are all just ok with it I don't understand. Hold yourself to higher standards please everyone's ok with the basic half assed work and I'm so confused

Your delete playlist button it right under the edit playlist button. I've accidentally deleted two very large playlists now. Piss me off. Move delete to the bottom of the settings on a playlist. Or underneath "invite collaborators" at least like come on. I'll bump you to 5 stars when this is fixed.

This would have been a 5 star review before the update completely ruined things. I love Spotify and I use it to study all the time but because of the update, songs refuse to play and I've tried everything on the help website but it's still the same story. I AM SO ANGRY ABOUT IT

Keeps removing songs from my playlists, STOP DOING THAT MAN. Random order isn't actually random it's set and never changes. Normal quality is GARBAGE, the higher quality is good and streams pretty well. They won't take my prepaid card, oh well I'm on tidal now why do these morons make it so difficult to pay them I've already given them over $500. The only advantage of Spotify over others is that is streams with less cut out on higher quality. Normal quality here should be illegal and a lawsuit.

I dont like the fact when I listen to my play list a weird song comes up that is not even on my play list. You also got rid of the looping buttons and only gave me 6 skips. I also don't want you premium. I have more things to worry about than your premium. Another thing I would like to add is the shuffle button on the playbutton, I hate it. I liked being able to listen to my music over and over again. I would rate it better is you've kept the loop buttons and gave me more skips.

Why does it require premium to skip songs more than 6 times an hour? So petty. "No, Jesse Pinkman, You can't skip songs until you pay ten bucks a month." Audiomack is better than this, and that's saying something.
The play bar has been disappearing for the past year or so and this still hasnt been fixed which then requires me to force stop the app multiple times a day. It's exhausting. I pay for premium.

Was working great until recently. However, has stopped working in a major way. When I'm not connected to the internet or even when I am playing music, the buttons disappear and so does any access to the app but it keeps playing or stops randomly and I can't get it to play again. Been recommended to switch apps, but will wait and see if there is an update patch... Have reinstalled already...
Frequently glitches out. Can't see now playing and skip/play/pause. Frequently errors "Spotify is trying to play" while playing... Requires force close or phone restart to work as intended.
Hacked multiple times... no 2 factor authentication... the helpdesk is quick to respond but still a hassle.

They Keep removing features. E.g. music preview on playlists..... (Next feature.....is disable the play button too why not ü§∑) just have a big pay to unlock. Sack your Dev team! The apps gone downhill.
They ask for premium always and ruin ur pleasure of using da app
Since the latest update songs won't play or will just skip the song quite annoying and I pay for the subscription need to sort it out ASAP
The software has really been sucking lately. Lots of visual glitches in the app requiring restart, and just general fuvky-wuckyness ü§∑

I was a premium user for 6 months . I canceled and went to Deezer when it started giving me constant problems with storing music and having to redownload them constantly . The app is also a bit glitchy . It does have the most polished GUI , beautiful to look at . They were just getting a bit to invasive for my taste and not working as intended . Not acceptable in a paid app .

Spotify used to be a good app until I wasn't able to see my playlists or play them. And if I tried to play them it would just load infinitely. And I have great wifi. So I recommend using another music app besides this one cause it just ruins the fun of music.
The app suddenly stops playing music on my Pixel 5a. I can't use it normally and it's quite annoying

Not sure where to report bugs so I'll just do it here, once it's fixed I'll change my review appropriately. Whenever I go on any playlist, go to find an artist, click onto either "See more" or any albums and preview the song, and then try to click the back button (both in app back on top left and Android back button, don't know if that matters), it crashes the app. I've tested multiple times under different circumstances and that's just what I've found :P

Been a premium member for years, and just noticed that my friends cannot listen to ANY of my custom playlist that I've made, which is about 95% of my collection. This is unacceptable. I've deleted and reinstalled many times and my friends still can't view my playlist to listen to the songs. I genuinely love this app and I'm sadden to see the lack of effort being used via your platform.
Everything requires premium. I hate it. The songs are good atleast.

You "like" songs & make playlists. That's really about it. Extremely LACKLUSTER software design. I mean seriously, a team of professionals designed this software? * No way to organize playlists on mobile. * Got rid of EQ on PC and never had it on mobile. (Must be a hard feature to develop!) * Why the extra tap to JUST see my playlists in my library. This was the worst design choice recently and incredibly annoying. Stop wasting time on useless features like "canvases". Nobody gaf about that.

Songs nd lyrics are helpful but the ad is seriously killing the vibe... I got 3 ad continuely for 30 seconds. I hate it Giving us free music by easy search but ruining it ad is bad that's why i gave 2 star

Sounds very clear, however its completely outweighed by the cumbersome UI, not being able to decide the order of music to play, not being able to skip more than six songs an hour, (why?) And for the love of God, STOP ADDING SONGS FOR ME!

I took great efforts in building playlists over years. Then one day I wake up and .. --> "log in to continue". I try logging in, "no user found with this email". I try all 4 of the emails that I have ever created in my life; no luck. I try my phone number, no avail. Forced to make a new registration, I finally log in. And... BOOM! ALL PLAYLISTS GONE! All history gone. All favorites gone! Thank you for a wonderful experience

(No i dont have premium btw)I will be quite honest this is the only reason im pissed but i just looked at my "episodes for you" thought it would be fine cause i never listened to anything weird on spotify well it seems they like digging into ur personal life like sexuality because on my recomended is something that should not be on this app called big bro's frat party where the picture is dudes having sex with prety much no clothing and im not out or want to be forced out by this or see it .

have had the 'Premium' subscription for awhile now, and have really enjoyed Spotify. recently, however, cannot get Spotify to play podcasts on Google nest. apparently this is a known problem with Spotify. music is fine. podcasts won't play on a number of external devices. extremely disappointed that this issue has been plaguing people for 6+ months with no sign of solution...and we're still paying full price, for partial service. Spotify, i really want to love you again. can we work it out?

it's an amazing music app, I love it and quit all my other music subscriptions but this one I just love how every update for my Galaxy S9 fixes one this and royally messes up another. like either the song will randomly pause, will needa pause and play to hear some songs are first, but those are fixed the newest is that it doesn't load the song on the bottom so you can't click the song your currently listening to or everything you click just takes your back to the playlist you where last looking

Plays songs that are not in my playlist when I click on the play button in the playlist not the first time this has done this. This issues keeps persisting. I don't want to listen to songs not in my playlist. Fix plz

Was hoping to get away from Amazon music. But this app only allows you to listen to whole albums and artists you can't actually build your own playlist. Glad I realized that before I spent money on it.

2 stars because when I try to play one of the popular songs on my fav artist profile, it shows names. I liked it when there was a list of their popular songs. But now it's just song names and a green button that plays a song that's from a different artsit that I don't listen to. Change it back to the popular list of songs instead of the names
The app doesn't play songs after clicking the next button

I've been using spotify for too long for it to constantly get worse. Currently it keeps lagging. Player dissappears in the app so you have to close it to be able to skip a song. Shuffle button is moved again so it takes longer to shuffle music since system always plays same songs out of thousands. It's just small bugs that could get fixed (and were) that keep making experience bad.

Its like the Spotify team tried to make the worst possible UI. Non of it is intuitive and a lot of features are either hard to access or not present. Unless you NEED spotify I'd recommend anything else, like Soundcloud.
Lately experience is awful. Every time rather cell phone is connected to 5G Network the app does not build enough buffer and the playback is really choppy!

Uninstalling App coz 1 song we listen and we've to listen 4 advertisement of 30 sec for each. No skip button after few sec. We can handle 1 advertisement after one song but not so many. For money they'll keep irritating you while enjoying the music.
Update the boring UI and UX please. The Apple Music App for Android has a better UI than this.

When you try listening to a certain song it forces you to listen to all these other songs because there's mix button that you can turn off and add after less than 3 song and 6 free skips every hour I would give this 4 stars on Spotify for PC and laptop cause the only downside to that is ads every 30 minute and you can't download songs but that's all fix if you get Spotify premium.
Not as good as it was, all mixes that "suit" me is nothing new, all just my liked songs list.

Worst app on my phone and TV. Continuously crashes and takes out additional apps and often entire OS. Plays when unprompted. Maintains play after stopped. Maintains Bluetooth connections when my phone Bluetooth is turned off. Poor quality. Continually loses songs I have previously liked without warning. The software design is trash. Good service. Trash app. I like many others only stick with the app. If I were introduced to spotify brand new tomorrow I'd laugh at the person who recommended it.
I do not like how it does not let me search up the songs, when I press the edit button to put in songs, but it doesn't show up >:( Please fix this now
App sux. Kicks my family out. Freezes often

This app is good I had a good experience and I didn't have problem with the adds also it was quite ok , but recently the app is not working properly it doesn't show my Playlist or liked songs I have lot of them and it's getting annoying. I thought Uninstaller and again download would do but it's no avail. Please do something about it I have lot of Playlists.
The UI is terrible and always gradually gets worse over time. Once my student discount is up, I'm cancelling. I'm tired of this terrible app.

So broken. So buggy. I have to restart the app 3 times before I can tap anything, before the UI shows up. Just unusable. Such a shame because I used to live Spotify so much. Don't know why the user experience has declined so much.

It was good before but now I cant choose what song to play because it automatically shuffles this feature was free but now you have to pay 10$ a month just so you can choose what song you wanna play. This is outrageous at this point and has completely ruined Spotify for me now somehow Pandora is better PANDORA IS BETTER HOW??!?! Just because I cant choose a song without it automatically playing a song I don't wanna listen too and I don't wanna pay ten whole dollars just so I can play a song.

Breaking so many privacy and permission laws. I was 100 miles away from home playing Pandora and driving, my wife started playing Spotify at my home on Sonos, suddenly my phone began playing Spotify. My phone had an update that morning and I don't use Spotify, so I had never opened it or attempted to use it. Obviously Spotify has backdoor access to everyone's apps and therefore their phones/devices. I expect to see a lawsuit in the near future.

The recent update doesn't allow to see the unplayed podcast episodes, or the titles, as easily. I have to click into every show to see what the episoe title is and there is no longer a button to quickly mark an episode as played. The interface before the update was perfect.
This is awful. I had to Google had to turn off shuffle. Worst UI on a music streaming app I've ever tried to figure out.
I thought about downloading this because my daughter uses it all the time, but now they've bought and ruined Heardle for everybody there's not a chance!!
The app requires updates too frequently and the pause and forward options disappear constantly. For the cost it should be more reliable!!!
Move the cast button away from the heart button, im tired of removing my liked songs ive had for 5 years just trying to cast.
They took away the podcast new episode button so I can spam listen to podcast this sucks

I love the UI of the app, but I found a lot of problems... First: when I put some song, the reproduction bar disappear. Second: In some cases the buttons doesn't work well (if you press them noting happend). Third: The app pause the song by itself. These problems stared since the last update of the app.
Whenever I try to open my liked songs, it doesn't open. Just shows a blank screen. If this is a bug, kindly fix this quickly!!

You guys have ruined this app. Until the most recent updates, I recommended this app all the time. Now you cant select a song, can't select an album, can't even listen to music without it crashing. I'll never recommend this to anyone again.
Too many ads detoriating user experience. I'm new to Spotify therefore not liking it.
Last update ruined app, nothing works. As soon as I'm on WiFi music stops.
spotify did not working on mobile data network! this is issue for us also complains about of my friends solve this issue quickly so we can use this application !!!
I lost all my downloaded playlisy in the last update! About "downloaded" button in the playlist ... would be nice to have the same button when using Android Auto...
Podcast playback interface is clunky and not intuitive

I like this app. I've discovered so many music artists thanks to it. I'm giving it 1 star because of the ads that have that buzzing mosquito sound effect. I listen with earbuds and hearing that is unpleasant.

I've been using this app for a while and have always enjoyed what it has to offer, that was until recently! For some strange reason Spotify has started cutting out, mid song and for no apparent reason. Another is you select an album to play, yet after about the 3rd song, it randomly skips to a completely different artist. I'm not sure what changes you made in your last update, but it's made the app worse and I hope that you fix these issues quickly before I cancel my subscription

Very worst app.....the ads are annoying in the middle of song...also no regional songs like we get in YouTube....we are forced to listen what are available and difficult to search favourite songs, some times not available my favourite songs.....I don't know how oppo provide in-built service this app.......very disappointed.....

If you don't wish to suffer then please don't download this thanks to the new update this app has became less favourable because the remove the unshuffle button and the choice to let you pick the music you want
App continues to undergo many negative UX changes to the point where it constantly crashes or breaks on a brand new phone

Its really unfair on how you can only turn off the shuffle button when on premium which makes free users not able to pick their right song when choosing. Its unfair and also, some users baught premium for that and it doesnt work like they just got scammed. Please fix your app.

Designed to play music and podcasts. The playback stops randomly for no apparent reason. When I tap on an album in 'discography', the next page/screen comes up blank, so I literally can't play an album of my choosing... The app is inconsistent and unreliable, which I can't communicate to the Devs bcz there's no way to contact them directly. Support options direct me to the Spotify 'community', who can't help with these clearly common issues. Very poor. Sent Email. Here's hoping...
New "what's new" tab replaced the podcast feed and now only was way less UX friendly now has also completely disappeared. Really not a good change

I love this app but the play button just disappears and reappears when ever it wants and that has become super annoying. You figure something that I pay for would work like it should. Also please stop moving the interface all around I can't find anything!
I pay my monthly and don't want to hear ads. Yet for quiet some time I get at least two ads during podcasts. Lame
I can not even open the App anymore. It startet when I quit my premium subscription. Since than I have not been able to open Spotify.

I am paying for this app. I work in remote areas with no cell service and it simply refuses to work. Downloaded playlists are still on the phone but it seems to still need an internet connection to load playlists. It randomly closes/crashes several times a day. Podcast interface is just counter intuitive. Sound quality is decent though and the selection of music is good.
Liked songs not open that the issue resolve quick please This type of issues worst solve the problem fast
App is broken and unusable, as a premium member I will not be continuing to pay for something I can't use. UPDATE: App is still broken after July 13th and 18th updates
Whenever I search a song and click play button never the selected song is played always other songs are played instead of selected one

Used to be great but now when I try to open the app it just shows the spotify logo on the screen but nothing else comes up. So I can't play anything. Hoping this gets sorted quickly or there is no point keeping my Premium membership.

I am not able to login to spotify. It shows error to update country but not allowing to login to update the country. I also cannot remember password and its not allowing to change the password too. This is too poor design of the application. I hope this can be considered and rectified.

Yes I love using Spotify however ever since you have made the update so every play list is automatically set to shuffle it has become quite frustrating not everyone likes to shuffle their music. Change it back.
imagine if EA had a streaming service and the skip forward button was behind s paywall. welcome to Spotify

Everything was working just fine then one day to the next the app would not respond....and nothing would play....the buttons wouldn't respond.....unistalled then reinstalled the app and well to my surprise all my play lists had been wipped clean......so no not a very happy customer at the moment üòûüòû
Play buttons go missing regularly and when I'm driving making this a reality sketchy app I pay for a premium but the app is dreadful

The audio stops playing randomly mid-playback. The media player quite often stops being displayed on the app screen or in my notifications. Casting occasionally cuts off mid playback. Various buttons also occasionally stop functioning seemingly at random.

Recent update ruined app. Now it's nothing but adds after every song (despite the ad that should allow more). Limited skips (understandable). Annoyingly I'm unable to play any liked songs. It now just plays a random song similar to them instead of that Playlist. I have yo use 5/6 skips yo get to a song I actually enjoy. It's honestly worthless now. I had to go back to YouTube and pandora which is just sad.

What the actual hell the app doesn't want to open Its been working fine until it suddenly decided to stop opening for no reason I've tried uninstalling it to no success.please fix this quickly I really need music it's a major part of my daily life.

The people behind the app keep making UI updates. I really like Spotify, but stop changing the UI. You keep removing elements. The most recent is the option to view the most recent podcast episodes across all my podcasts in one simple place. Stop moving things around arbitrarily. Why do you need to make things confusing when they already work so well?
This app plays philippine communist studies. Ban these podcasts. The app is being used to recruit students to join terrorist/commie in PH.

I love Spotify and we have a family premium but as other reviewers have mentioned, sometimes the song play button disappears from the bottom so you can't check the queue etc or skip songs - this is usually restored by restarting my phone but I shouldn't have to do that everytime. Songs randomly pause sometimes and the shuffle feature doesn't always work or repeats songs in the same order constantly. It used to work perfectly fine but has been having problems more recently on my android phone :(

I like the music selection, and I like that I can use it for an alarm. What I don't like is that the shuffle button is always on, and the only way to turn off shuffle is to buy the premium. Putting a basic function behind a paywall is stupid and frustrating

Spotify use to be my favorite app but not anymore thanks to the fact that u can only forward six songs per hour except if u are using Spotify premium which requires payment that I can not afford. An App for the financially-abled, hmmm.

Since last update I have lost control of how I can play music, it stops for no reason, there is no play pause buttons anymore. The only way to stop the music is by closing the app. Today i can't even play music at all... What's next? Spotify any solutions? Do I have to keep paying for your no service? A month later and it keeps stopping on its own!!!! Please fix the bugs!!!!!!!ü§¶ 7/17 New realease and same troubles...
Shuffle button only plays 10 same songs, music stops randomly mid track, downloaded songs cannot be played. This app used to be good, now it became a piece of dung

Cuts off songs ¬æ of the way through, won't play the songs I PUT on a Playlist but will play an algorithm within MY Playlist. I cannot in good conscience pay $10/mo for a premium subscription when the base version is more interrupted than the radio. Update: I'm done. Keep your Playlists, suggested songs and ads. You've ruined this app. Now I have to go create new playlists on a different app. THAT is time consuming and tedious.
How do you even play it. Press play button and it keeps going to Bluetooth even though my watch is already connected to my phone

Why would you take up precious screen real estate by adding a button that only does 2 things? -Record a podcast?! Why would I ever do that on my phone?? And what % of your users make content? -Create a playlist?? That belongs in the library where my playlist lives . I create a playlist once every few months, I don't need that staring at me all the time. Stop adding random 'features' and just focus on squashing bugs, please.

The app was pretty functional until recently. When I opened my usual playlist and went for a random song in the middle of the Playlist it would play properly. But after that you'd expect the song right after to play right? No. The song to play right after is the first song on my playlist and I can't get this to stop. This is quite aggravating

I can't switch my storage to my SD without it showing my entire library as gone and every playlist as empty. I followed every one of their troubleshooting guides and nothing worked. Just use a different app cause this one sucks.
I'm experiencing an issue where a song would randomly lag for a few seconds, multiple times and it would ruin the experience for me because it's so annoying to listen to

For the first year or so spotify worked fine and I had very little problems or complaints, recently however not one of my liked songs or playlists shows up in my library. I've tried all I can think of and, as you might understand, all of my songs I have in my playlists I enjoy a lot, and to lose all of that is disappointing and irritating. I really do hope that this issue is resolved quickly or I will have to take my listening somewhere else. Thank you.

Basic feature about showing Song names quite terrible. As professional Hong Kong user which will listen song different countries, like Japan, Taiwan, China, Hong Kong. As English phone user, why spotify force user to see the songs with strange translation, or not able user to choose the language to view the name. Since spotify still not support hires music, I am going to choosing another substitute and cancel subscription. Thanks.

Battery eater deluxe! Thanks i get to almost hear part of a song and then it cuts out yet the time keeps advancing. Next thing you know a 3 minute sing is 24 minutes long.... Nothing plays of course but it eats the battery. This sucks!!!
Bring back native language song name otherwise I will just quit the subscription!

WOW, THESE REVIEWS!!! SPOTIFY ARE NOT LISTENING!!! Glitchier and glitchier.. Has always been a sterling app but something has changed. I very rarely leave reviews and if I do, they're almost never negative but I feel compelled in this instance, as the Spotify app has got to be the worst app I have ever used. I'm on pay as you go with no Internet access unless I'm on Wi-Fi and all I use this app for is to listen to podcasts which I download in full before my work commute. It's obvious it simply has not been designed with any consideration for a user like myself. I would go as far as to state that it's terrible for podcasts in general, regardless of how you use your phone. To give you some examples: 1. When I'm at work, my phone will connect to the work Wi-Fi. There's an internal authorisation process to let devices use Internet when on the company network. What happens is that I can't play any podcasts if my phone's Wi-Fi is on - I press the play button, but nothing happens. I have two phones, one authorised to use the network and one not and this happens on both of them. I think what is taking place in the first instance is that our heavily filtered network will not let Spotify download ads and it completely throws it out of the loop. In the second instance, I think even though my phone is well aware it has no Internet access (despite being connected to Wi-Fi), Spotify ignores this fact and still tries to download ads before playing my podcasts. So every time I'm still within the huge range of my company's Wi-Fi, I need to disable my phone's Wi-Fi before I can play my podcasts for the commute home. After they start playing, I'm free to switch the Wi-Fi back on. But this isn't even the worst that this app does. 2. Quite frequently, right when I leave my company's Wi-Fi range (it always happens at almost the exact spot down to a few meters), the podcast that is being currently played will stop, losing its progress and the next one on the list will start playing. This is especially aggravating when I'm in the car and switching back to the podcast I was listening to and then finding the exact spot where I finished is impossible to do safely without stopping somewhere. But this still isn't the worst of it. 3. Recently the app started to randomly show all of my podcasts as not downloaded or actually deleting them (I'm still not sure what exactly happens as this only occurred 3 times so far, but all instances within the last month). The first time it happened, I've noticed as I walked out the door for work that my podcasts were gone. I had to redownload them all before leaving - I'm fortunate enough to be in a position where my bosses don't care what time I clock in but otherwise I'd probably by quite irritated. The next couple times it happened as I was trying to play my podcasts on my way home from work - but in those cases, when I got home, they annoyingly again started showing as downloaded and I could play them with no problems. Mind you, I have 40GB of free storage on my phone. And then there's the absolutely shockingly unusable and ugly interface (but I suppose it does fit the terrible Spotify logo). Manually removing a downloaded podcast from my playlist and downloads is an unintuitive multi-step process. I can't even change the order my podcasts will play in once they're on my playlist. I couldn't find a way to loop the playlist either, so if the last episode on your playlist is the first one you'll want to play, then you'll have to manually start the list from the top once it finishes. It can be supper annoying if this happens when you're on a motorway. It's like whoever created this app hasn't actually used it. It just blows my mind that a company as big as Spotify can't make an app that works, is usable and doesn't look like it was designed in Excel (actually, you can do much prettier things in Excel than that).
Stops playing music randomly, UI breaks often, and "Randomize" only plays 20 song loops in my 300 song playlist.

The UI lacks key points that should make everyone's lives much easier: - You cannot see in what playlists a song already is in. - Apart from the playlists, you cannot organize your music, all you have is a huge list of saved albums and artists. - The queue should display the songs that you have already listened to in that queue. - You should be able to add a song to more than one playlist a a time. - In desktop they deleted the feature of being able to search in the list of playlist, when adding a song, to sort them, but added it in mobile a while back ??

Unfortunately, using this app has felt like more of a chore than anything else. The app constantly ceases to function correctly nearly every single time I use it. This app has been suffering from major stability problems that have been documented in a large number of reviews. The only way I have found to make the app somewhat functional is to constantly clear cache and force stop the app. I don't enjoy submitting negative reviews but in this case I feel that it's justified. The app has been suffering from these stability issues for about a year now which I have never seen from a large company. I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the app's poor user experience, especially considering that the service is a paid subscription. For now, if anyone is experiencing loading issues, try force quitting the app and clearing the cache first before uninstalling the app or restarting your phone.

Not to mention the business model... Pay your artists...

This is so broken atm. What ever song I am playing its pulling the details and pics from another list. Can't see where the song is up to on the progress bar. It also randomly stops playing and thwn sometimes keeps playing when closed. Pause/ play does not indicate and this all affects the app on my Gear fit with the same visual errors. In addition the new app on my Gear fit it terrible. Why to I have to going in and open the app to then use the player dropdown. Not intuitive at all.

The app has changed so you cannot listen to the songs you want because you have to shuffle the playlist to find the songs you want. You can only skip 6 songs every hour without the premium I am currently uninstalled the app I am very upset that my favourite music app has been ruined by its developers thank you for your service please be sure to take note of my 1 star and be inspired by it for your further reviews of this app Apologies, Frank

Always used on free Spotify it was great. Upgraded to 3 months free trial and then it went bad. My account was hacked and now all my playlist are ruined. There's over 1000 songs added to my personal playlist not to mention liked artists I've now got to trawl through one by one to delete. Spotify were helpful in removing the hackers but now I need to spend hours I don't have in getting my Spotify back to how I had it previous. I wouldn't pay for it again.

Horrible user experience for the arguably largest music platform. How can such a large profile, large budget company not manage to create a fluid and swift app is completely beyond me. The menus are slow. The animations slow things down further. No EQ on a music player??? Cmon. You can't even select multiple tracks at a time for queuing. It's the only app on my device with an active subscription, and it's also the worst app on my phone.

Video quits working after a while. Uninstall then reinstall video works for a while and then quits again. I'm trying to play a song list and the app locks up. Kill app open again still won't play song list. App still thinks it's playing JRE but it's not. I only got the app to listen to Joe. Disappointing Came back tried this app out again. Brought up The Joe Rogan experience got a bunch off ads. Still no video.

This is such an annoying experience, the app would just stop playing all of a sudden until you press any button (power, volume) to turn up the phone back light. It'd start playing the moment you press any button but wouldn't ask your permission before stopping unnecessarily. This has been happening for months even after purchasing a premium plan.

I actually think the audio quality is ZERO!!! I listen to songs with a headphone and i cant hear the beat peacefully until i pressed the button on my mike. I even bought a new headphone thinking that it broke and i wasted my moneyüò©üò©üò©üò©. Pls dont use this app. Its useless. And the buying premium is even WORSER!!! This app sucks

New update is awful. I hate the screen for when you're listening to a song. I loved seeing the art and now there is no '...' button on the song screen to be able to add it to a playlist or go to artist, etc. Really impractical

The ui, millions of songs on the go, everything is good so far, but there are way too many advertisements for the basic users like me. What I actually wanna say is that it's ok to have adds at some point, but giving so much just ruins the experience and I think using YouTube music on desktop is somewhat better than using spotify...

For an app that I pay for, the experience is hampered by problems. Smart watches can't auto connect unless you have your phone open and on Spotify, the play button often doesn't work at all. Sometimes when music is played, the buttons and the song duration bar freeze, and only a force shutdown fixes it. These require an immediate fix, and I have no clue why they haven't noticed this yet.

Good when it works but it struggles to find devices to stream to. It eventually found my Sonos speakers but it refused to stream to my Google smart speakers. The only way to get those to work was to use Google Home and play media on them and then select Spotify. Some work required to Spotify App.

A reasonably good app for listening to music. Like others I feel the home screen is a poor design with content in a rather ramdom order which is constantly changing and suggestions that don't interest me it would be good if I could remove content that that doesn't interest me. It also has started showing episodes of a podcast on the home screen which I no longer want to listen to. It would be good if I could remove these altogether!

very nice best music app you will love it üñ§ . I have given app a 5 star rating but now I just can't bear more I have purchased Spotify premium for 1 month and It was all good but now I am getting ads just after every 2 songs which is really annoying my friends who have not purchased premium a single time are getting least ads but me it not like that I feel like spotify is pushing me to buy premuim beacuse it knows I can buy but this is not okay I am going to leave this app after sometime
Great UI and have most of songs but after a month of usage you'll get two ads after a song which is like forcing to buy a premium. Wynk is better alternative to this with hellotunes

I bought spotify premium for a week and I was so frustrated because the whole point was to be able to listen to your downloaded music without wifi/data. I got logged out of my own account so many times and had no wifi/data to login. My downloaded songs kept re downloading everytime I had to log in. Ultimately, my subscription was a waste. Quite ironic for the number of ads that come in the free version
Terrible App. Requires repeated forced stops and resets just to troubleshoot basic navigation, load playlists, play music, and open menus.

Full of botters and fake accounts, ruins the app all discover music sections filled with fake music. No sign of fixing this issue, records of people experiencing this since 2018. Swapped to YT music offer a much better service

Playback cuts out at random frequently. UI constantly out of sync with playback. Can't choose to stream podcasts in audio only. Options in settings are very lacklustre. Can't customise the home screen or get rid of playlist garbage which I have no interest in using. For a premium service app with the resources of a big company, it's pretty rubbish.

The features of the app is great no doubt. But even after you go premium and downloading the songs it won't play during a bad connection it never load!!!! . This kinda sucks.. Unlike playmusic or youtube music it stills roll and play even without an internet connection if you have downloaded the songs. For this reason its only a 2 star from my side since it's not meeting my requirements. Also some of the songs that I like can't be downloaded!! . App is tooo slow

Please add a straight "Play" button to this app. Shuffle shouldn't be the default play option. Tracks are not randomly placed on an album and the default should therefore be to play tracks in the order intended by the artist. Why is this so hard?

I rate this app 2 stars, I tried to listen to a song,and I accidentally put it on do not play,so I took it off of that,then... the song just won't play at all!,and when I want to get to the song quickly,I need Spotify premium to skip!,im better off using the pc or Xbox version at this point.
They are so lucky there isn't any competition. This app is so slow, the UX is so confusing, and over time expect a huge cache to build up on your phone or computer.

I have used Spotify for a long time now but since the update it keeps having problems. When connecting via Bluetooth to my car it will not show what's playing then when I'm done it continues playing off my phone and I can't turn it off unless I restart my phone. It gets stuck on the song screen showing the wrong song and the buttons doesn't work or lags really bad. It's getting pretty annoying.

Pretty much garbage unless you want to pay the $10 a month subscription. Like I can live with the shuffling of an album if I'm a free user, and can live with the ads. but, the fact that I can't even go 3 songs before I start getting songs from different album or artist entirely kinda ruins the service.

Terrible, user experience which has gotten gradually worse to a point were the app is freezing multiple times a day on a top of the line Samsung. No point downloading songs cause you can't even play them off-line the app doesn't load without internet, so disappointing paid customer for almost 4 years, not sure what they are investing it on. Need to clean the app and reduce the clutter to improve user experience.

Recent update to android 11 means the app no longer shows the now playing notification, the app doesn't recognize that it's currently playing, and I have to force quit the app to get it to stop. I so not have this issue with other audio apps. Spotify support says it's android 11s fault but I would expect spotify to test their app in android 11 and raise concerns before it launches...

The ads are worst thing in the app, I'm giving it one star because these ads ruin your mind. We listen songs to freshen up our mind but these ads make situation more worst. Now they'll reply that we will look into the issue bla bla bla........only remove the ads . One who came to listen the song is not interested to buy anything nor to take any subscription.

It's not good!! Came here for Joe Rogan but it wants to know too much info and crazy amount of advertisements!! 7 ads before the podcast plays along with tons more during the podcast. Go back to YouTube Joe so I dont have to deal with this very intrusive and horrible app!! I already downloaded it but if you are hesitant just dont do it!! I'm stuck with them sending me emails about this dumb app and I've quit using it now.

Tried the duo premium but it keeps going back to the free subscription. Tried some guides on the internet but none worked. I decided to cancel the premium but couldn't find the "cancel premium" button suggested by internet guides. Not much help can be found in the spotify support section either.

It's great if you never pause or hit the 15 sec back button... stupid app keeps jumping back to the same spot on a podcast regardless of how far ahead I have already listened when paused or rewinding 15 seconds. Functionality with earbuds pause/play is spotty and unreliable, regardless of brand... thanks but I'm going to use this app only for Rogan since most everyone else is available on Sticher etc

HATE this stupid app. Been searching for alternatives tonight. Works only when it bloody feels like it which is 20% of the time. Same reports as other users. Glitchy, slow, doesn't connect to bluetooth well, won't play songs/podcasts, quits itself randomly etc etc. I fight with this stupid app every day. In QLD, we now get a $1000 fine if caught touching our phones while driving so you can imagine how thrilled I am when Spotify quits itself while I'm in the car. Hate it.
Plays any song of its whims instead of playing one I click on. Happens when I am using google devices. Please work on your UI, it's not as intuitive as you would think.

Absolute garbage. Wont let me play the songs i want to play. I click on my friends album to give it a listen press play and instead its juice wrld or justin bieber. I didnt click on that, i clicked on my friends albums. Then they tell me i only get 6 skips per hour when one of his songs that i already heard shows up. I would never pay for premium on something that functions like trash. Save yourself the trouble and get apple music if you plan on paying for music, spotify is not user friendly.

Just a shockingly bad app. Freezes and locks up, not super Intuitive, lacks basic features like play history. I just don't get how such a popular service like Spotify can consistently drop the ball like this. It should be sleek, amazing, always improving... But instead we get this jalopy.

Much like Facebook it is currently a buggy, unstable and nearly unusable mess. Android Auto rarely works smoothly and will often require restarting the device for it to even connect. Slow, cluttered and painful to use despite the fact that it was a solid app 2 years ago.

It's been like 3 years and there is still problems with the app interacting with the internet. Why does it take so long (or never) load when you're trying to access an offline playlist. Also the options menu is seriously annoying to access in a playlist/list of songs, the scroll bar is touched way too often instead of the menu button. By menu button I mean the 3 dots to either add to playlist or queue. From a Samsung S10 user. Same problems on my "offline phone" HTC One.

This app is very broken on android to play video. It often doesnt play the correct podcast video, i select a different podcast to watch and it keeps playing the same video until i quit the app and restart. Spotify Ads interrupting a podcast even though I pay for premium should not be happening. Podcasts do not play if connected to vpn, even if vpn is set to same country that I reside in...

Horrible free user experience, forces users to pay just to listen to a specific song. Ads are fine every now and then but removing the ability to listen to a specific song is a money hungry crash grab attempt.

This app performs terrible on Android. I'm a paying subscriber, and use Spotify as my main music/podcast platform. It opens quickly, but the search and play functions take an eternity to respond. Even where songs and podcasts are downloaded, the Spotify app can take five to 10 minutes to begin playing. There is, as far as I know, now workaround for this. My wife has an iPhone (and is also a paid subscriber) and has never had this issue. The shuffle, it has to be said, is also rubbish.
Buggiest app I have, always having issues playing music but the app doesn't reflect that, Android auto issues, forcing me to force quit. Very disappointing for such a big company

The old UI from like 2016-2017 was way better, now it looks cheap. Not to mention I don't get barraged with ads from YouTube to watch podcasts like i do with spotify. No comment section for podcasts, Spotify doesn't even keep up with the latest music only mainstream stuff. The playlists like Rapcavier have looked the same for years now, they've barely changed. It just got crappier and crappier through out the years, I use to buy spotify premium all the time now I don't even use it at all.

As to my experience so far it's not much different from the desktop version, the only difference is that people that lost their ability to pay for premium services, have now been stabbed in the back and forced to have voice ads interrupt their listening experience which I imagine makes you lose quite a few patrons that would have possibly returned, and may still return if you quit doing it!!

App freezes constantly on Note S20 Ultra. I recently got this new phone and it seems as soon as One UI 3.0 installed on the phone this app is extremely buggy, freezing, crashing a lot. Please fix the bugs Spotify!

Spotify has alot of good music with good quality sound. However I don't understand why they ask you to select artists to listen to...and then give you playlists to listen to with not a single song from any of the artists you picked when signing up. Quite disappointed

Why does bringing on the Joe Rogan Podcast mean I can't listen to downloaded music or podcasts. Spotify had months to prepare. Also, if I wanted to watch video podcasts I would use an app That streamed video. Quit doing too much... Update: it's gotten worse

I don't have premium. I was listening to some song today, wanted to listen it from start now. 15s ad. Song doesn't start from start but continues to play where I left it. Okay, I press again to replay. 15s ad. It didn't again from start. I press replay. Again 15s ad. I've heard more ads today than songs. Too much ads, would be nice if ads appear after a few songs, this reactive ads are killing app. Feels like you've spent more time developing your app for ads than user experience.

I am a premium subscriber and lately the android app became a complete disaster. It stops mid-song, searching sth takes ages. The most annoying, I cannot switch between devices on my phone anymore! If I was listening on my pc and left that room, I cannot even play anything on my phone. You require URGENT fix Spotify, otherwise I cannot see a reason to pay!

Before the New Year Spotify free version had three months trial and few advertisements. It was tolerable and friendly. Now they reduced it to one months free trial and really amped up the adverts with quite insulting content to some extent as if we don't have some intelligence. The service is brilliant in terms of everything available but the free version now is totally spoilt by the inundating level of adverts.
The app is complete garbage and constantly refuses to play songs, drops the entire queue, etc. Should not be this difficult for a multibillion dollar company to design an app to play audio files

Half the time this app doesn't even work. It takes forever to load anything, including downloaded albums/podcasts. Quite regularly the app crashes or freezes during a song. Its so frustrating for a service that I use so often and pay money for to barely work. Spotify really need to fix these huge issues as going off other reviews, these issues are fairly widespread.

Improvements are made, but when one gets fixed, there's something else that just ruins the experience. Im glad they allow songs to play after the searched track has been finished, however when you search for more and add to Que, the Playlist continues playing its own songs and the que is inaccessible. Have to add the track to a Playlist then play it from that in order to access que.

The UI is completely unusable and overall just aneurysm inducing Trying to navigate this UI or even use it is the equivalent of going to a maze only to find out the entire maze is just one brick wall.

Trying to find and listen to podcasts is one of the worst experiences I have ever had. Play/pause sometimes just doesn't work. Podcast timeline will freeze. And when you tap 15 sec forward or back it will skip from when the timeline froze. I download podcast episodes, but it will still buffer. Clicking follow on a podcast seems to mean nothing. If it does do something it is not intuitive. Faster to just search everytime.

So many 'basics' not included in the free account. Obvs designed to get peops to pay for 'premium' but pushing it a bit too hard by making the free option so super limited. They also shove songs in the playlist that u haven't chosen as 'recommended' which are rubbish songs. Other than that it's a great app.

I am a premium subscriber and have been for many years. The app is a total disaster at the moment. I've reinstalled the app so many times and nothing seems to help. Why am I paying per month for this?

Was a great app. Won't work on any connected bluetooth device or corded device only playing off phone speaker now. Yes I've googled it and went to the geeks. Not fixable, not going to upgrade my phone for your app ill buy an ipod first. S8 issues? Im tired if having to push my home button while driving. I shouldn't be doing that to begin with. All 3 of my cars and all bluetooth device stop and start randomly now. Fix it or lose more money. Im canceling my family plan.thanks.
Now a days it's giving a lot of ads, like in every 5 mins there is ad, before, it was like in every 20 or 30 minutes, but now it gives a lot of ads and ruins the whole mood.

Pathetic app. Within 24 hours of signing up, i get an email that my password has been reset, and that I have to set a new password, and not the same as the original. I cant play songs. Yet another great app bites the dust with abject greed. Impossible to listen to it as a non-premium customer with incessant, disruptive, and long ads completely ruining the experience. Ads usually intrude every 4 mins of listening time and last for over a minute and half.

Makes you pay for premium so you can loop songs and make it to where they dont force add songs to a playlist you made, just use the computer version, its basically the phone app equivalent of having premium features but its free.

Current version is flawed. Pauses by itself when connected to Bluetooth, keeps playing on device after disconnecting and disables device volume control until force quit. Will amend review if addressed in next update

Ordinarily a decent app, but there's a glaring bug that after playing through android auto, then getting out the car, the music will start playing again. Incredibly annoying and a quick Google search shows this has been going on for a long time. Ridiculous that this still hasn't been fixed.
WAYYY too many ads I just want to enjoy music. But i cannot. ITS BECAUSE HALF OF THE TIME THERE ARE ADS PLAYING. Completely ruins the experience.
Paid for premium when i saw it advertised as no ads and able to use Spotify on more than 3 devises but that is not the case, as only 1 device can be use at one time quite misleading in my opinion.

Terrible. The worst app I've ever used, bar none. Totally unintuitive. Who designed this thing? After the recent update it won't connect most of the time. I hate it so much - and my family hate the way I start throwing things around when I try to use it.

I expected a lot more from Spotify I'm on the free version, but usually, if the free version is good, you feel like getting the premium .....Spotify Free, does not inspire you to buy the premium The free version is filled with Ads, made by absolute amateurs, that have no sense of humor and are repeated till you feel like getting your sick bag out Shuffle does not work because it repeats the same songs, even though, you clicked the "Shuffle" button Pathetic App

The free version is not very complete but i actually understand. The real problem is with the next button that I can't click more than six times an hour and the advertisement is too present üò¢

Premium is great, but when I can't afford the luxury, the free version is ridiculous. I wouldn't begrudge an ad or two, I get they need the revenue, but when I have to listen to 6 ads in a row before listening to a song I can't even choose specifically for myself, I draw the line. Not worth it.

This is a great app and i use it all the time but its exrtremely annoying how they prioritize ios users over android. Little features like swiping on a song to quickly add to queue does not exist on android even though its such an easy change to make for spotify. Only downloaded spotify to watch full episodes of joe rogan. Have premium, cannot figure out how to watch videos on the app at all. Followed the guide on their site and it was useless. Can only listen and not watch, what fun is that???

Quite good, but lately quite buggy. Removes downloads, doesn't play songs, that sort of stuff. Very frustrating, and also while I'm at it I never understood why they removed the search bar at the top of playlists and hid it under a menu, making it needlessly complicated.

I really want to like this app. I was using YouTube music and enjoying it. I didn't like that it didn't suggest new music very well, kind of just played my same old stuff all the time. Recently it's not playing anything, it plays the adverts then the song looks like it's playing as has the pause button, but no sound comes out. Works on laptop, but not on phone. Good for listening to and discovering new music, but the podcast function needs work - I've been unable to play podcasts via Spotify on my android phone - aside that, visibility and navigating to podcasts is clunky i.e. where it is easy to quickly jump into a playlist or start listening to random music from the app landing page with a tap or 2, podcasts are not so, requiring a less than optimal traversal through the app to get to desired podcast content

Sorry, but I can quite safely say that this is a huge cash grab. Without premium not only do you get ads, but also lower audio quality, songs automatically added to your play list and you are forced to play on shuffle. Left the app because none of the other services do this.

This is, without a doubt, the absolute WORST big-name app I have ever had to use in my entire life. Why on EARTH does it keep INSISTING on using the internet to retrieve content I have already downloaded??? Used spotify premium happily for years, however this is one of the worst apps I have ever used, it's hard to believe they actually want people to use their service it is so totally unbearable. Constant issues trying to load things, app crashes, songs not starting or pausing randomly or even showing up as the wrong song entirely. this app used to be so good and intuitive, now i can't edit the queue, i can only listen to playlists on shuffle (who tf thought that listening to 'previews' in playlists was a good idea?) it's just overall harder to use and more frustrating. I'm considering switching back to an older version tbh

My Experience GOOD: On Laptop/PC it's great, apart from the ads, select any song and do what you want with it. What you want from this app. BAD: Mobile. Tablet or phone its just terrible. Having an issue with "like button". Never gets green, even with previously liked songs. Also the "liked songs playlist" is gone. Stops playing for no reason. Fix these please

I've always like using Spotify during traveling time that's why I subscribed to premium. Its ridiculous for me to continue subscribe further if this two issue doesn't fix at all especially the first!! I hope you can quickly fix it!

I can't believe how much Spotify sucked. Even with paying for it there's adds in the podcasts, they don't have a quarter of the bands I like, the app isn't intuitive and it's not at all clear what's downloaded. I am seriously disappointed after all of the hype.

I'll bump my review once you fix this app. Why is it when your phone is unplugged the app just quits for no reason? Very annoying. If it keeps up, I'm unsubscribing from your service. If you're paying, you should expect it to work.

Why the heck, can i not view all songs - from opening an artist menu? Why isn't this an option from the artist menu? Why do I have to search that particular artist into the search menu, then go to "see all songs" as a drop down? This is a serious flaw! UX needs to be updated!

Way too many ads!! Back to back 2-3 ads between every 2-3 songs. It's like one song per ad. And why am I getting Hindi ads when the language preference I've selected is only Tamil and English? Suddenly the app stopped playing songs!! Its is so annoying, the play button is on, but still the songs aren't being played!! Please fix! @spotify

One of the worst apps I've encountered. There is no playback in my drop down menu to pause or resume, it pauses randomly every 5 to 10 mins, when I open app the minimised control buttons dont work, cannot pause with my headphone button but can resume when it pauses itself go figure, when the app is open and I pause in the fullscreen controls leave app and go back the podcast is back at the start. I've used Spotify more than 2 years now .The amount of ads being played is just insane now .I know they want us to get premium but this is ruining the whole experience..if the ads become more frequent then I guess we just have to stop using spotify

App is really going downhill. The option to repeat a song or playlist is near impossible as the repeat button cannot be located, if even still in existence. Love to tell you that you're getting 30mins of ad-free music for watching an ad on the free version before bombarding you with about ten ads over the next 30mins, literally without fail & every time. In general, I like it, but the following features are important to me. 0. NO OUTPUT DEVICE SELECTION in the desktop app settings. 1. Missing "Add to queue" option for playlists. 2. There is no way to buy individual tracks so that you can then listen to them without subscription and advertising (Google Play Music have this feature). 3. I did not find in the desktop client a quick launch button (with one click) of recommendations mixed with my favorite music (like "Flow" by Deezer and "I'm feeling lucky" by Google Music). There is a similar, but not one click. 4. There is no number of times played for each track (Google Play Music have this feature). 5. No lyrics in text form (like in the unofficial Google Play Music player, but it's in beta mode right now). Lyrics in text form is really useful for non native language speakers. For example, in my case I often don‚Äôt understand English by ear, especially in songs, but having the lyrics in front of my eyes I understand everything or almost everything. P.S.: I give 1 star for the attention of developers to the review, in fact, I would rate it higher. If the mentioned features appear, I will change the rating.

No-one would accept functionality this poor from any app they paid for unless it was as ubiquitous as Spotify. Sure, music plays fine on the phone - but as soon as you want anything 'special', such as connecting to other devices (which is a selling point of Spotify and Spotify-branded devices) or making a queue (which WinAmp did better in 1999!!), Spotify struggles like the appalling POS that it is. Spotify is a prime example of why monopolies are bad for everyone - except for those who own it.

Mediocre interface, and scan-to-join simply doesn't work. The UX is generally f-ing appalling -- I expect far better from an app like this. I also, perhaps foolishly, pay for the damned thing. Anyone with a chance to negotiate adequate streaming licences should be paying attention, because Spotify has only been treading water or getting worse for the past two or three years. Make something better, and you'll have an immediate audience.

Absolute trash thst forces you to either buy the app or listen to what they wsnt you ti hesr fir the next 20 hours, you can't listen to a single song that you want to listen to but instead they put it in a Playlist where you have to listen ti 10 other songs before it amd you can't skip, you have to pay to be able to skip or listen to music, this is NOT a free app, this is a payed app in disguise and they are pushing it so damn hard

i have premium and it works wonders with my laptop. however the mobile version is less and less usable on my mobile device (a smartphone)... the app force closes randomly (it usually happens after skipping songs) (and i cant even report the crash, because the app just resets itself without prompting me to report the issue, very inconvenient for yoy guys, since you wouldn't know the specific circumstances of these errors, and it would make fixing all this all the more difficult...), the queue feature does not work anymore (songs on queue won't olay as if i had never set up a queue in the first place), and i have to keep the app open so it keeps playing music, because otherwise it will stop after three songs or so - even if i am on wi-fi. quite honestly these problems become worse with each update, which is a shame because it is an otherwise wonderful program. it /does/ work as intended on my other mobile device (a tablet) which is way older - but not on my phone! it's frustrating... i hope fixes are applied soon for my device model/operating system, because these issues severely decrease my enjoyment from the app, which is a service i pay for. but i count on you, spotify programming team!

Good on the surface but a lot of crippling bugs. Gets stuck loading a LOT and they make arbitrary interface changes on a monthly basis that don't improve the app whatsoever. Sounds like uxui teams are really tryna keep their jobs...

This app is really convenient, with the ability to stream (almost) anything (almost) everywhere. But my experience has worsened over the months I've been using it. At first my gripes were with the ugly, featureless, uncustomizable UI. Moving from Foobar to Spotify is like moving from kit from Knight Rider to a rickshaw with no pedals or driver. And AFAIK Spotify has discontinued support for third party clients which is ludicrous considering their POS client. If someone reading this has no problem with Spotify's UI. Imagine if you could sort your music by year released, add your own genre tags and bring up all your music tagged "rock" and "rap" and shuffle that. Imagine you could change the appearance of your client, so that obnoxious vomit green isn't all over your screen. This, coupled with the fact that as I've added playlists and albums to my library my client has slowed considerably, such that opening the app on any platform takes a minute before I can do anything, minus Linux which "only" takes 30 seconds. In conclusion, Spotify revitalise your support for the creation of third party apps, and after a working Foobar plugin gets created I'll change this review to a 5. Edit: app started freezing and crashing on my new phone too.

Look, Spotify is undoubtedly the best music streaming service... for consumers. It's a great service. Here's the thing though: Spotify may be the best and biggest, but it doesn't pay even close to the highest amount of revenue to artists per stream. The amount artists make from Spotify is a miserable tuppence compared to other streaming services that are inferior in every other way. Napster, which is an unintuitive, messy app with a far, far smaller user-base pays a uniform ~1.7 cents per stream -- about 300% what Spotify pays to artists. Spotify, I love you, but there is no reason why you shouldn't be better to artists than this. The artists deserve better from you. And when you decide to get your act together I'll be back, but in the meantime I'll be buying music straight from the artists and streaming on Napster. Hope to see you soon.

Current issues with the app are: no notification, can't change music without entering app, can't skip more than three songs without it jamming, constantly thinks it's offline so cannot search or play non-downloaded music, doesn't recognise when Bluetooth is disconnected, can't pause/play from Bluetooth, cuts itself off every 20 minutes. There are complaints on their forum about this from over three months ago so it's really bizarre they haven't either patched it or rolled back to a previous version that does work while they rebuild an obviously disastrous update. When it worked it was the best music app - but not by much, and any one of the issues above should be enough for most people to use GPM or Amazon Music or Apple Music or YouTube Music or any of the other plethora of options.
